data.name: Sad Birthday String
data.description:
# Story Today is Lucas' Birthday. Everyone is having fun, and all is going well, until his Birthday String was finally delivered to their doorstep, at 2pm. His Birthday String sucked, because Birthday String shouldn't have any Double Letters in it. As he was dissapointed at his Birthday String, his parents got an idea! Birthday Strings could also be split into pieces; just in case these types of situations happen. However, these cannot be concatenated together since it easily gets ruined. Of course, his parents still wanted Lucas to have a long and great Birthday String as it means how prosperous your CS career would be -- similar to Chinese Birthday Noodles. Now, as a parent of Lucas, it is your job to find the longest part of the Birthday String that doesn't have a double letter. If unclear, double letters mean something like "aa", "bb", "cc", "dd",..., "yy", "zz".
# Input ```2 < len(birthday_string) < 1000```
```birthday_string only has lower case english letters```
```Assume birthday_string can be a perfectly fine birthday_string -- not always has double letters -- :)```
# Output The longest continuous substring from `birthday_string`
On your bithday, I hope for a long yet perfect Birthday String for you!
